org.spongepowered.api.service.scheduler

Interface Task

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable

    public interface Task
extends Identifiable
    Represents a task that has been scheduled.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean cancel()
      Cancels the task, if it has not already run.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.Long> getDelay()
      Gets the delay that the task was scheduled to run after.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.Long> getInterval()
      Gets the interval for repeating tasks in ticks.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<java.lang.String> getName()
      Gets the name of this task.
      PluginContainer getOwner()
      Returns the plugin that scheduled this task.
      java.lang.Runnable getRunnable()
      Gets the Runnable that this task is running.
